summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office forwarding an FTC-related document (dated 2007) to an unspecified recipient, indicating the sharing of financial investigation materials related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An FBI forensic accountant is actively sharing FTC (Federal Trade Commission) documents as part of an investigation, with one attached document dated 2007.
The communication suggests ongoing financial scrutiny or discovery related to the Epstein case as of June 2021.
The email indicates a collaborative or informational exchange, likely between law enforcement or legal entities involved in the case.
